sentences.english: By means of high - temperature curing, the curing period of lime - fly ash stabilized bound macadam is shortened.

sentences.english: The avocado shows a typical loss of green color and a reduction in vegetative growth.
sentences.chinese: 鳄梨呈现典型的叶色褪绿及营养生长减弱。

sentences.english: Assertively putting joy and happiness into each day is truly a lifesaving move.
sentences.chinese: 在每天的生活中添加些快乐元素是一种养生之道。

sentences.english: Now, years of doing this (a.k.a “deleveraging”) have restored purchasing power. Debts have been reduced or eliminated;
sentences.chinese: 如今，数年的“休养生息”重新塑造了强大的购买力。

sentences.english: They can also be used for keeping people healthy in the summer.
sentences.chinese: 有时也可作为夏季养生的保健饮食。

sentences.english: 8A wolf pack is bedded down in the snow in Yellowstone national park.
sentences.chinese: 一群狼正在以黄石国家公园的雪地为床，休养生息。

sentences.english: Under such a regimen you'll certainly live long.
sentences.chinese: 你按照这样的养生法一定可以长寿。

sentences.english: Bamboo Health Tea can be combined with Guozhen Pine Pollen for a better effect.

sentences.english: It has a good effect on life preservation and cure.

sentences.english: We will make continued innovation on the way to rehabilitate overloaded rivers and lakes.
sentences.chinese: 继续创新让不堪重负的江河湖海休养生息的有效途径。

sentences.english: Some Judaic disciplines possessed the function of life nourishment and health care.

sentences.chinese: 如今，数年的“休养生息”重新塑造了强大的购买力。

sentences.english: This five-minute-a-day regimen of appreciation and gratitude will help you to focus your life in awe.
sentences.chinese: 这个五分钟感恩养生法将帮你将生命专注于敬畏。

sentences.english: Lake in longevity, good health movement.
sentences.chinese: 在长寿湖，养生运动再好不过。

sentences.english: Before sleeping steep foot with the hot water are an acknowledged health the habit is well.
sentences.chinese: 睡前用热水泡脚是一个公认的养生好习惯。
